title: Is it just me or does Sion's passive need to have a cool down?
body: Sion can die over and over again but people almost try to get killed early so as to use his passive. Lb has a passive cool down on her mirror image and so does Anivia's egg reborn so why doesn't Sion have one? Should this change try to be implemented in the next patch? Whats your thoughts.

replies.body: Firstly, you're comparing a passive that requires death with passives that prevent death. If you take a look at passives that require death (namely Karthus and Kog'Maw) you'll notice they don't have cooldowns. Secondly, since his passive requires him to die Sion would be giving his opponent gold and experience from his death in order to use his passive, which is only useful if he manages to kill someone else. It's pretty easy to get away while his passive is activating so it becomes useless.
